A bugfix release for [bud v6.6.x](https://bud.js.org/releases/tags/6-6).

## 🩹 [@roots/bud-imagemin](https://bud.js.org/extensions/bud-imagemin) — webp preset not working as intended [#1886](https://github.com/roots/bud/pull/1886)

- 🩹 fix [#1888](https://github.com/roots/bud/pull/1888)
- 🧪 improve unit test [sources/@roots/bud-imagemin/src/extension.test.ts](https://github.com/roots/bud/tree/main/sources/@roots/bud-imagemin/src/extension.test.ts)
- 🧪 add reproduction [tests/reproductions/issue-1886.test.ts](https://github.com/roots/bud/tree/main/tests/reproductions/issue-1886.test.ts)
- 📕 improve [@roots/bud-imagemin docs](https://bud.js.org/extensions/bud-imagemin)
- 📕 add [bud.imagemin.encode docs](https://bud.js.org/extensions/bud-imagemin/encode)
- 📕 add [bud.imagemin.configure docs](https://bud.js.org/extensions/bud-imagemin/configure)

## 🩹 [bud.entry](https://bud.js.org/docs/bud.entry) — import syntax breaks with Bud 6.6.x [#1890](https://github.com/roots/bud/pull/1890)

- 🩹 fix [#1891](https://github.com/roots/bud/pull/1891)
- 🧪 add reproduction [tests/reproductions/issue-1890.test.ts](https://github.com/roots/bud/tree/main/tests/reproductions/issue-1890.test.ts)
- 🧪 improve unit test [sources/@roots/bud-api/src/methods/entry/index.test.ts](https://github.com/roots/bud/tree/main/sources/@roots/bud-api/src/methods/entry/index.test.ts)
